# uniqueId

**Instance Property**

Returns the unique ID for a record.

## Declaration

```swift
var uniqueId: String! { get }
```

## Return Value

The unique ID.

## Discussion

This method is equivalent to invoking [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABRecord/value(forProperty:)], passing `kABUIDProperty` as the argument.

## Getting Identifying Information

- **displayName**: A user-visible string representing the record.
